document_data.name: Surtlan's Metalwares
document_data.mainbody: '''Surtlan's Metalwares''' was a shop in the city of [[Waterdeep]], owned by [[Baerhar Surtlan]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This shop was located along [[River Street]],
document_data.Structure: This shop stood a single story tall.
document_data.Services: Surtlan's Metalwares sold metal products and equipment.<ref>
